name: Target Zombie
description:
3D shooter

You cant kill the zomies! Shoot the turrets to activate them, only turrets can kill the zombies. This is an endless game! Lest see how far you can survive!

Mouse to aim and shoot. WASD  to move, space to jump!

You can use your weapon to shoot and light the room with the bullet.

This is another Unity practice game with a lot of tools being used and tested! :)
